required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Drug-Drug Interaction (DDI) Between HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion and Rifampin Capsules
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center, Open-Label, Randomized, Two-Stage, Two-Way Crossover Study Evaluating Drug-Drug Interaction (DDI) Between HSK3486 Injectable Emulsion and Rifampin Capsules in Healthy Subjects.

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase I, single-center, open-label, randomized,two-way crossover, propofol-controlled, two-stage study evaluating the safety and pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics of IV maintenance dose and IV single loade dose plus maintenance dose of HSK3486 emulsion for injection in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC0-t, AUC0-∞)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
From the start of HSK3486 administration until the subjects is fully awake on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: MOAA/S(modified observer's assessment of alert /sedation)-time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration until the subjects is fully awake on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the change of modified observer's assessment of alert /sedation during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 60 min after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of bispectral index during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of blood pressure during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of heart rate during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.measure: Respiratory rate or blood oxygen saturation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of respiratory rate or blood oxygen saturation during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of blood routine test during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of urine routine test during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of Blood biochemical examination during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Observe the changes of heart rate, RR interval, QT interval , QTcF interval , PR interval and QRS interval of electrocardiogram during the whole trial

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1
From the start of HSK3486 administration to 24 h after the start of administration on day 1

intervention.description: Sequence 1: Intravenously infuse 0.4 mg/kg HSK3486 in the morning on an empty stomach. Complete infusion within 1 min.
Sequence 2: Orally take 600 mg rifampin once a day for 8 consecutive days in the morning on an empty stomach, followed by 1 min intravenous infusion of 0.4 mg/kg HSK3486 30 min later.
